00011 ServiceProxy::ServiceProxy( unsigned int PeerId, SimpleString eHostName, int eControlPort )
00012         : ControlClient(PeerId)
00013 {
00014         HostName        = eHostName;
00015         ControlPort     = eControlPort;
00016         FullDescription = false;
00017 
00018         if ( ConnectToCtrlServer(HostName, ControlPort) == true )
00019         {
00020                 UpdateDescription();
00021         }
00022         else
00023         {
00024                 // throw  SimpleException("ServiceProxy failed");
00025         }
00026 }

00028 ServiceProxy::ServiceProxy( unsigned int PeerId, SimpleString eHostName, int eControlPort, ServiceProperties& ServiceProps )
00029         : ControlClient(PeerId)
00030 {
00031         SimpleString TmpString;
00032         VariableAttribut * VarAtt;
00033         InOutputAttribut * IOAtt;
00034         int Pos;
00035         unsigned int Port;
00036 
00037         HostName        = eHostName;
00038         ControlPort     = eControlPort;
00039         FullDescription = false;
00040 
00041         // Is the description
00042         TmpString = ServiceProps["desc"].GetValue();
00043         //if ( ServiceProps.IsDefined( "name" ) )
00044         //{
00045         //      OmiscidError( "Warning, forced fallback for '%s' (%s).\n",
00046         //              ServiceProps[NameString].GetValue().GetStr(), ServiceProps["id"].GetValue().GetStr() );
00047         //}
00048         //else
00049         //{
00050         //      OmiscidError( "Warning, forced fallback for %8.8x.\n", PeerId );
00051         //}
00052         //if ( TmpString == "forced fallback" )
00053         // OmiscidTrace( "Working on'%s' (%s).\n",
00054         //      ServiceProps[ControlServer::NameString].GetValue().GetStr(), ServiceProps["id"].GetValue().GetStr() );
00055 
00056         if ( TmpString == "full" )
00057         {
00058                 FullDescription = true;
00059 
00060                 for( Pos = 0; FullDescription == true && Pos <  ServiceProps.GetNumberOfProperties(); Pos++ )
00061                 {
00062                         ServiceProperty& LocalProp = ServiceProps.GetProperty(Pos);
00063 
00064                         if ( LocalProp.GetName() == "desc" )
00065                         {
00066                                 continue;
00067                         }
00068 
00069                         // SimpleString TmpName = LocalProp.GetName();
00070 
00071                         // Parse property
00072                         TmpString = LocalProp.GetValue();
00073                         char * TmpChar = (char*)TmpString.GetStr();
00074                         switch( TmpString[0] )
00075                         {
00076                                 // Work on Variables
00077                                 case 'c':
00078                                         if ( TmpString.GetLength() <= 2 || TmpString[1] != '/' )
00079                                         {
00080                                                 FullDescription = false;
00081                                                 continue;
00082                                         }
00083 
00084                                         // Ok, something like c/...
00085                                         VarAtt = new VariableAttribut( LocalProp.GetName() );
00086                                         if ( VarAtt == NULL )
00087                                         {
00088                                                 FullDescription = false;
00089                                                 continue;
00090                                         }
00091                                         VarAtt->SetValue( TmpChar+2 );
00092                                         VarAtt->SetAccessConstant();
00093                                         listVariableName.Add( LocalProp.GetName() );
00094                                         listVariableAttr.Add( VarAtt );
00095                                         break;
00096 
00097                                 case 'r':
00098                                         if ( TmpString.GetLength() != 1 )
00099                                         {
00100                                                 FullDescription = false;
00101                                                 continue;
00102                                         }
00103 
00104                                         // Ok, something like r/...
00105                                         VarAtt = new VariableAttribut( LocalProp.GetName() );
00106                                         if ( VarAtt == NULL )
00107                                         {
00108                                                 FullDescription = false;
00109                                                 continue;
00110                                         }
00111                                         VarAtt->SetAccessRead();
00112                                         listVariableName.Add( LocalProp.GetName() );
00113                                         listVariableAttr.Add( VarAtt );
00114                                         break;
00115 
00116                                 case 'w':
00117                                         if ( TmpString.GetLength() != 1 )
00118                                         {
00119                                                 FullDescription = false;
00120                                                 continue;
00121                                         }
00122 
00123                                         // Ok, something like w/...
00124                                         VarAtt = new VariableAttribut( LocalProp.GetName() );
00125                                         if ( VarAtt == NULL )
00126                                         {
00127                                                 FullDescription = false;
00128                                                 continue;
00129                                         }
00130                                         VarAtt->SetAccessReadWrite();
00131                                         listVariableName.Add( LocalProp.GetName() );
00132                                         listVariableAttr.Add( VarAtt );
00133                                         break;
00134 
00135                                 // Work on Connectors
00136                                 case 'i':
00137                                         if ( TmpString[1] != '/' || TmpString[2] < '0' || TmpString[2] > '9' )
00138                                         {
00139                                                 FullDescription = false;
00140                                                 continue;
00141                                         }
00142 
00143                                         // Check if we've got a correct port
00144                                         Port = 0;
00145                                         Port = atoi(TmpChar+2);
00146                                         if ( Port == 0 || Port >= 0x0000ffff )
00147                                         {
00148                                                 FullDescription = false;
00149                                                 continue;
00150                                         }
00151 
00152                                         IOAtt = new InOutputAttribut( LocalProp.GetName(), NULL, AnInput );
00153                                         if ( IOAtt == NULL )
00154                                         {
00155                                                 FullDescription = false;
00156                                                 continue;
00157                                         }
00158                                         IOAtt->SetTcpPort( (unsigned short)Port );
00159                                         listInputName.Add( LocalProp.GetName() );
00160                                         listInputAttr.Add( IOAtt );
00161                                         break;
00162 
00163                                 case 'o':
00164                                         if ( TmpString[1] != '/' || TmpString[2] < '0' || TmpString[2] > '9' )
00165                                         {
00166                                                 FullDescription = false;
00167                                                 continue;
00168                                         }
00169 
00170                                         // Check if we've got a correct port
00171                                         Port = 0;
00172                                         Port = atoi(TmpChar+2);
00173                                         if ( Port == 0 || Port >= 0x0000ffff )
00174                                         {
00175                                                 FullDescription = false;
00176                                                 continue;
00177                                         }
00178 
00179                                         IOAtt = new InOutputAttribut( LocalProp.GetName(), NULL, AnOutput );
00180                                         if ( IOAtt == NULL )
00181                                         {
00182                                                 FullDescription = false;
00183                                                 continue;
00184                                         }
00185                                         IOAtt->SetTcpPort( (unsigned short)Port );
00186                                         listOutputName.Add( LocalProp.GetName() );
00187                                         listOutputAttr.Add( IOAtt );
00188                                         break;
00189 
00190                                 case 'd':
00191                                         if ( TmpString[1] != '/' || TmpString[2] < '0' || TmpString[2] > '9' )
00192                                         {
00193                                                 FullDescription = false;
00194                                                 continue;
00195                                         }
00196 
00197                                         // Check if we've got a correct port
00198                                         Port = 0;
00199                                         Port = atoi(TmpChar+2);
00200                                         if ( Port == 0 || Port >= 0x0000ffff )
00201                                         {
00202                                                 FullDescription = false;
00203                                                 continue;
00204                                         }
00205 
00206                                         IOAtt = new InOutputAttribut( LocalProp.GetName(), NULL, AnInOutput );
00207                                         if ( IOAtt == NULL )
00208                                         {
00209                                                 FullDescription = false;
00210                                                 continue;
00211                                         }
00212                                         IOAtt->SetTcpPort( (unsigned short)Port );
00213                                         listInOutputName.Add( LocalProp.GetName() );
00214                                         listInOutputAttr.Add( IOAtt );
00215                                         break;
00216 
00217                                 default:
00218                                         FullDescription = false;
00219                                         continue;
00220                         }
00221                 }
00222         }
00223 
00224         if ( FullDescription == false )
00225         {
00226                 UpdateDescription();
00227         }
00228 }

00247 SimpleList<SimpleString>& ServiceProxy::GetInputConnectors()
00248 {
00249         // We got everything
00250         if ( FullDescription )
00251         {
00252                 return GetInputNameList();
00253         }
00254 
00255         // In other case, update the description
00256         UpdateDescription();
00257 
00258         return GetInputNameList();

00304 void ServiceProxy::UpdateDescription()
00305 {
00306         if ( IsConnected() == false )
00307         {
00308                 ConnectToCtrlServer( HostName, ControlPort );
00309         }
00310 
00311         if ( QueryDetailedDescription() )
00312         {
00313                 FullDescription = true;
00314         }
00315         // else the value of FullDescription remain the same
00316 }

00336 unsigned int ServiceProxy::GetPeerId()
00337 {
00338         unsigned int tmpPeerId = 0;
00339         SimpleString lPeerId = GetVariableValue( PeerIdString );
00340 
00341         if ( sscanf( lPeerId.GetStr(), "%x", &tmpPeerId ) == 1 )
00342         {
00343                 return tmpPeerId;
00344         }
00345 
00346         return 0;
00347 }

00354 bool ServiceProxy::SetVariableValue(const SimpleString VarName, const SimpleString Value)
00355 {
00356         // Update description if needed
00357         if ( FullDescription == false )
00358         {
00359                 UpdateDescription();
00360         }
00361 
00362         if ( IsConnected() == false )
00363         {
00364                 // Update description if needed
00365                 if ( ConnectToCtrlServer(HostName, ControlPort) == false )
00366                 {
00367                         throw SimpleException("Can not connect to the Service.");
00368                 }
00369         }
00370 
00371         if ( QueryVariableModif(VarName, Value) == NULL )
00372         {
00373                 return false;
00374         }
00375 
00376         return true;
00377 }

00384 SimpleString ServiceProxy::GetVariableValue(const SimpleString VarName)
00385 {
00386         VariableAttribut * pVar = FindVariable(VarName);
00387         if ( pVar == NULL )
00388         {
00389                 throw  SimpleException("Unknown variable. Call HasVariableFirst.");
00390         }
00391 
00392         // If the variable is initialised
00393         if ( pVar->IsInitialised() )
00394         {
00395                 // If we can get the current value
00396                 if ( pVar->GetAccess() == ConstantAccess && FullDescription == true )
00397                 {
00398                         return pVar->GetValue();
00399                 }
00400         }
00401 
00402         if ( IsConnected() == false )
00403         {
00404                 // Update description if needed
00405                 if ( ConnectToCtrlServer(HostName, ControlPort) == false )
00406                 {
00407                         throw SimpleException("Can not connect to the Service.");
00408                 }
00409         }
00410 
00411         // Il all other cases
00412         pVar = QueryVariableDescription( VarName );
00413         if ( pVar == NULL )
00414         {
00415                 // This one *here* should not appear
00416                 throw SimpleException("Unknown variable. Call HasVariableFirst.");
00417         }
00418         return pVar->GetValue();
00419 }

00426 bool ServiceProxy::AddRemoteVariableChangeListener(const SimpleString VarName, RemoteVariableChangeListener * Listener )
00427 {
00428         // Serach the variable
00429         VariableAttribut * pVar = FindVariable( VarName );
00430         if ( pVar == NULL )
00431         {
00432                 // not found
00433                 return false;
00434         }
00435 
00436         if ( IsConnected() == false )
00437         {
00438                 // Update description if needed
00439                 if ( ConnectToCtrlServer(HostName, ControlPort) == false )
00440                 {
00441                         throw SimpleException("Can not connect to the Service.");
00442                 }
00443         }
00444 
00445         // Add information about me
00446         Listener->SetUserData( this );
00447 
00448         // If we can not add the listener
00449         if ( pVar->AddListener( Listener ) == false )
00450         {
00451                 // Add information about me
00452                 Listener->SetUserData( NULL );
00453 
00454                 // Say there was a problem
00455                 return false;
00456         }
00457 
00458         // If it is the first listener, subscribe to the variable changes
00459         if ( pVar->GetNumberOfListeners() == 1 )
00460         {
00461                 // first listener
00462                 // Subscribe to the variable changes
00463                 Subscribe( VarName );
00464         }
00465 
00466         // ok
00467         return true;
00468 }
00469 
00475 bool ServiceProxy::RemoveRemoteVariableChangeListener(const SimpleString VarName, RemoteVariableChangeListener * Listener )
00476 {
00477         bool ret;
00478 
00479         // Serach for the variable
00480         VariableAttribut * pVar = FindVariable( VarName );
00481         if ( pVar == NULL )
00482         {
00483                 // Not found    
00484                 return false;
00485         }
00486 
00487         if ( IsConnected() == false )
00488         {
00489                 // Update description if needed
00490                 if ( ConnectToCtrlServer(HostName, ControlPort) == false )
00491                 {
00492                         throw SimpleException("Can not connect to the Service.");
00493                 }
00494         }
00495 
00496         // Aswk to remove the listener
00497         ret = pVar->RemoveListener( Listener );
00498         if ( ret == false )
00499         {
00500                 // something goes wrong
00501                 return false;
00502         }
00503 
00504         // Do we have any listener left ?
00505         if ( pVar->GetNumberOfListeners() == 0 )
00506         {
00507                 // If no, unsubscribe to the variable changes
00508                 Unsubscribe( VarName );
00509         }
00510 
00511         // say, it was ok
00512         return true;
00513 }

00519 bool ServiceProxy::HasVariable(const SimpleString VarName)
00520 {
00521         return (FindVariable(VarName) != NULL);

00530 bool ServiceProxy::HasConnector( const SimpleString ConnectorName, ConnectorKind ItsKind /* UnkownConnectorKind */ )
00531 {
00532         InOutputAttribut * pAtt = FindConnector(ConnectorName);
00533         if ( pAtt == NULL )
00534         {
00535                 return false;
00536         }
00537         if ( ItsKind != UnkownConnectorKind && pAtt->GetType() != ItsKind )
00538         {
00539                 return false;
00540         }
00541         return true;
00542 }

00549 SimpleString ServiceProxy::FindConnector( unsigned int PeerId )
00550 {
00551         // Update description if needed
00552         if ( FullDescription == false )
00553         {
00554                 UpdateDescription();
00555         }
00556 
00557         // Serach for the connector
00558         for( listInputAttr.First(); listInputAttr.NotAtEnd(); listInputAttr.Next() )
00559         {
00560                 if ( listInputAttr.GetCurrent()->GetPeerId() == PeerId )
00561                 {
00562                         return listInputAttr.GetCurrent()->GetName();
00563                 }
00564         }
00565 
00566         for( listOutputAttr.First(); listOutputAttr.NotAtEnd(); listOutputAttr.Next() )
00567         {
00568                 if ( listOutputAttr.GetCurrent()->GetPeerId() == PeerId )
00569                 {
00570                         return listOutputAttr.GetCurrent()->GetName();
00571                 }
00572         }
00573 
00574         for( listInOutputAttr.First(); listInOutputAttr.NotAtEnd(); listInOutputAttr.Next() )
00575         {
00576                 if ( listInOutputAttr.GetCurrent()->GetPeerId() == PeerId )
00577                 {
00578                         return listInOutputAttr.GetCurrent()->GetName();
00579                 }
00580         }
00581 
00582         return SimpleString::EmptyString;
00583 }

00585 bool ServiceProxy::GetConnectionInfos( const SimpleString Connector, ConnectionInfos& Connection )
00586 {
00587         InOutputAttribut * pAtt = FindConnector( Connector );
00588         if ( pAtt == NULL )
00589         {
00590                 OmiscidError( "Could not find connector nammed '%s'\n", Connector.GetStr() );
00591                 return false;
00592         }
00593 
00594         Connection.TcpPort = pAtt->GetTcpPort();
00595         Connection.UdpPort = pAtt->GetUdpPort();
00596         Connection.Type    = pAtt->GetType();
00597 
00598         return true;
00599 }

00601 // Utility functions
00602 VariableAttribut * ServiceProxy::FindVariable( SimpleString VarName )
00603 {
00604         // Update description if needed
00605         if ( FullDescription == false )
00606         {
00607                 UpdateDescription();
00608         }
00609 
00610         VariableAttribut * pVar = ControlClient::FindVariable(VarName);
00611         // if ( pVar == NULL )
00612         // {
00613         //      pVar = ControlClient::QueryVariableDescription( VarName );
00614         // }
00615         if ( pVar == NULL )
00616         {
00617                 if ( FullDescription == true )
00618                 {
00619                         // Not found
00620                         OmiscidError( "Variable '%s' not found\n", VarName.GetStr() );
00621                         return NULL;
00622                 }
00623 
00624                 if ( IsConnected() == false )
00625                 {
00626                         // Update description if needed
00627                         if ( ConnectToCtrlServer(HostName, ControlPort) == false )
00628                         {
00629                                 throw SimpleException("Can not connect to the Service.");
00630                         }
00631                 }
00632 
00633                 // Try to get the variable if we do not get the full description
00634                 pVar = QueryVariableDescription(VarName);
00635         }
00636         return pVar;
00637 }
00638 
00639 InOutputAttribut * ServiceProxy::FindConnector( SimpleString ConnectortName )
00640 {
00641         InOutputAttribut * pAtt;
00642 
00643         // Update description if needed
00644         if ( FullDescription == false )
00645         {
00646                 UpdateDescription();
00647         }
00648         
00649         if (   (pAtt = FindInput(ConnectortName)) != NULL                                       // Is is an Input ?
00650                 || (pAtt = FindOutput(ConnectortName)) != NULL                                  // Is it an Output
00651                 || (pAtt = FindInOutput(ConnectortName)) != NULL                                // Is is an InOutput ?
00652                 )
00653         {
00654                 // We found it
00655                 return pAtt;
00656         }
00657 
00658         // Here we did not find the connector
00659         OmiscidError( "Connector '%s' not found\n", ConnectortName.GetStr() );
00660         return NULL;
00661 }
